Dashboard.homeDesc: Professional-grade market data, on-chain analytics, and AI-driven insights for the modern investor.
Dashboard.prismDesc: Comprehensive overview of the global financial market with real-time data.
Dashboard.feedDesc: Curated market updates and AI-driven analysis tailored for you.
Dashboard.feature1Desc: Live market data streaming via WebSocket with sub-second latency for crypto and traditional assets.
Dashboard.feature2Desc: Deep dive into blockchain metrics, whale movements, and network health indicators.
Dashboard.feature3Desc: Check real-time prices and detailed data for major global assets and cryptocurrencies.

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.content: FireMarkets ('we', 'our', or 'the Company') values your privacy and complies with applicable data protection laws. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.

dataCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We may collect the following types of information to provide our services:

items.cookies: Cookies and access logs: Usage records, IP addresses, browser types
items.analytics: Usage statistics: Page views, session duration, click patterns (via Google Analytics, etc.)
items.account: Account information: Email address, password (when you sign up)

items.service: To provide and operate our services
items.improvement: To improve our services and develop new features
items.communication: To send important notices and respond to inquiries

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information, including encryption, access controls, and security software.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Disclosure
thirdParty.content: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties, except as required by law or with your explicit consent.

userRights.title: 6. Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict the processing of your personal information at any time. Please contact us using the information below to exercise these rights.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.content: For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at contact@firemarkets.net.

agreement.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please discontinue use of our services.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content: FireMarkets provides market data, on-chain analytics, news, and information related to cryptocurrency and financial assets. Our services are provided for informational purposes only and do not constitute investment advice.

items.accuracy: Provide accurate information: You must provide accurate information when registering.
items.security: Account security: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials.
items.compliance: Legal compliance: You must comply with applicable laws when using our services.

intellectualProperty.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, designs, logos, and software on this service are protected intellectual property of the Company. Unauthorized reproduction, distribution, or modification is prohibited.

disclaimer.title: 5. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of information provided through our services. We are not liable for any damages resulting from the use of our services.

investmentRisk.title: 6. Investment Risk Disclosure
investmentRisk.content: ⚠️ Investing in cryptocurrency and financial assets involves significant risks, including the potential loss of principal. Information provided on this service does not constitute investment advice. All investment decisions are solely your responsibility. Please consult with a qualified financial advisor before making any investment decisions.

serviceChanges.title: 7. Service Changes and Termination
serviceChanges.content: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate all or part of our services at any time without prior notice. We are not liable for any damages resulting from such changes.

governingLaw.title: 8. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Korea. Any disputes arising from the use of our services shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the courts of the Republic of Korea.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: For any questions regarding these Terms of Service, please contact us at contact@firemarkets.net.
